function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of respiratory pandemics like COVID-19 in urban settings","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and transmission in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Implementation of non-pharmaceutical interventions (NPIs) and public health measures","Technologies":"Public health monitoring systems, contact tracing technology","People":"Urban residents, commuters, and workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, urban planners, policymakers"},{"Description":"Neglect of communicable diseases in 'healthy urban planning' literature and policy","Impact":"Risk of overlooking measures to prevent and mitigate communicable diseases in urban areas","Mitigation":"Incorporation of strategies to address communicable diseases in urban planning and policy","Technologies":"Data analytics for disease tracking, public health impact assessments","People":"Urban planners, public health researchers","Owner":"Urban planning institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of integration of health and wellbeing dimensions in urban planning","Impact":"Inequities in access to health-promoting environments and services, including disease prevention measures","Mitigation":"Adoption of holistic approach to urban planning that encompasses health and wellbeing dimensions","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping, urban health impact assessments","People":"Urban residents, marginalized communities, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, community organizations"}]}
